about_the_game:
Overview

"Reality" is a single-player horror adventure game where you chase after the forgotten truths left at your old school.

The Story

One day, you realize you're standing in your school at night, starting to remember something important about an incident you left behind there. Amid memories blurring reality and fantasy, you delve into the forgotten truth about a female student and set out on a journey to confront your past.

Gameplay

Pick up her notes in a school full of lunatics and uncover the truth behind the horrific incident.
With a flashlight to illuminate the darkness, you will never lose sight of your destination.
You can acquire an item from a school bag left behind at school that can incapacitate certain murderers.

The recent major update has greatly improved the game's playability.

Major update

  • The player's movement speed has been increased and is no longer slowed down by enemy attacks.
  • The energy bar has been eliminated, and movement speed no longer reduced with energy.
  • Sound effects and other production elements have been dramatically enhanced and some of the dialogue has been revised.
  • Texture resolution has been increased and graphics have been greatly improved.
  • Lots of lights have been added to the map to further improve the atmosphere.
  • The UI has been improved and UI graphics have been enhanced.
  • The effect of the pigeon man now reverts after a certain period of time.

    About the live video

    Posting and distribution (including monetization) of live video clips of this game is not a problem.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains intense violence, blood and gore.
